mapper.select: SELECT r2.resNum, TO_CHAR(r.resCin_date,'YYYY.MM.DD') resCin_date, TO_CHAR(r.resCout_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') resCout_date, TO_CHAR(r.resReg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') resReg_date, r.resCode, r.resName, r.resPhone, r.resTotalcost, r.resPoint, r3.roomName, m1.memberEmail FROM memberHost m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.mhId = m1.memberId JOIN room r3 ON m.mhId = r3.mhId JOIN reservationDetail r2 ON r3.roomNum = r2.roomNum JOIN reservation r ON r.resNum = r2.resNum WHERE r2.resNum = #{resNum}
